title: Pokedroid Extras (Android .apk)
description:
This is the latest version of Nolan Lawson's PokeDroid Extras, the compliment to PokeDroid 1.5.2. It contains an installer (APK) to copy additional resources to the PokeDroid app, found here. All pokemon-related apps are being removed from the Google market in compliance with a DMCA complaint by The Pokemon Company inc, but this would otherwise be free.
